title.rendered: The Best Hotels and Homestays in Munnar

content.rendered:
10 Magical Munnar Hotels and Homestays, Munnar is one of the most visited hill stations and a majestic place, is understandably one of the most famous tourist destinations in Kerala. Located at the convergence of three mountain streams- Kundala, Muthirapuzha and Nallathanni, Munnar was once regarded as the summer resort of British government. Picture book town, sprawling tea plantations, holiday facility and winding lanes have made this destination a popular resort town.

Royal Mist

  • Location: 10 km from Munnar
  • Price: Mid-range
  • Highlights: Scenic views, spice garden, personalized service
  • Amenities & Activities: Trekking, sightseeing, plantation tours, farm visits

Royal Mist lies at a distance of about 10 km from Munnar and is surrounded by spectacular views. Owned by Mr. Anil and his family, Royal Mist welcomes its guests with incredible hospitality and allows them as much independence as they require. It is a modern house which has three guestrooms that look out onto the beautiful valley. Personalized service is offered at the homestay that can be enjoyed by the guests.

Royal Mist also has a spice garden which has wild orange and mango trees in it. Guests can take a walk in the surrounding areas and click some beautiful pictures. Tourists can also indulge in other activities such as sightseeing, trekking and plantation tours. Since a long time, Royal Mist has been getting 5 star reviews from the people who have visited it. It offers a perfect setting to enjoy an idyllic and beautiful family outing to explore the natural beauty of the region at its best.

  • Suggested Tour: Munnar Tour Packages

Kaivalyam Retreat

  • Location: 8 km from Munnar
  • Price: Mid-range to high-end
  • Highlights: Yoga retreat, organic farm, peaceful surroundings
  • Amenities & Activities: Yoga sessions, organic vegetarian meals, nature walks

Surrounded by spice plantation and forests, Kaivalyam Retreat lies at a distance of about 8 kilometers from the fascinating Munnar town. It is a harmonious health retreat and is an ideal place to bring your mind, soul and body in harmony. Set amidst scenic, calm and peaceful surroundings, Kaivalyam Retreat offers an amazing experience to its guests during monsoons. International as well as domestic travelers visit this exquisite location to enjoy natural way of living.

This homestay includes a number of things that may interest the vacationers. Regular classes of yoga are held for beginners as well as for experienced people. An organic farm is also present in the vicinity where vegetables are grown for the vegetarian food served during the home stay. A trip to this alluring location can help the vacationer to enjoy himself amidst the never ending landscapes, natural pathways of streams and sprawling tea and coffee plantations.

The Tall Trees

  • Location: 8 km from Munnar
  • Price: Mid-range to luxury
  • Highlights: 66-acre property, diverse wildlife, beautiful sunsets
  • Amenities & Activities: Nature walks, bird watching, cardamom plantations

As the name suggests, tourists can find a number of tall trees in and around this resort. Spread over sprawling 66 acres, The Tall Trees resort is located at about 8 kilometers north of the appealing Munnar town. It beckons nature lovers with its scenic surroundings and peaceful ambiance. The surroundings are rich in bio diversity with more than 600 trees, rock formation, wildflowers, cardamom plantation, orchids, wild animals and birds.

Vacationers can enjoy the beautiful sunsets from one of the rooms. This resort has preserved the pristine natural beauty in its perfect condition along with offering modern day comforts in ideally arranged cottages. Honeymooners can spend their ideal honeymoon at this location where they would not feel even a moment of boredom. So celebrate life with The Tall Trees resort and plan a vacation to feel refreshed and rejuvenated.

Gruenberg Tea Plantation Haus

  • Location: 12 km from Munnar
  • Price: Mid-range
  • Highlights: Tea plantation setting, misty mountain views
  • Amenities & Activities: Tea tours, scenic walks, nature exploration

Are you fond of tea? If yes, then do not miss the chance to stay in the middle of tea plantation. Lying at a distance of approximately 12 kilometer from the Munnar town, Gruenberg Tea Plantation Haus is a beautifully designed resort. The accommodation is spread over 3 levels which have rooms with balconies so that the guest can sit and enjoy the peaceful ambiance.

So choose Gruenberg Tea Plantation Haus, set amidst misty mountains, prairies of Munnar and orchards tea garden, as your next holiday destination as it will help you to feel refreshed and free from all your worries. Gruenberg Tea Plantation Haus would offer you a wonderful time that can be spent with your family members.

Swiss County

  • Location: Munnar
  • Price: Budget to mid-range
  • Highlights: Affordable luxury, panoramic views of misty hills
  • Amenities & Activities: Relaxation, nearby nature exploration, family-friendly

Cool climate, lush green forests, misty mountains and gurgling streams were the reasons why British used to call Munnar as the “Switzerland of India”. Swizz County is a small jewel which is present in the crown of Munnar. The luxurious Swizz County resort aims at giving its guests the best experience. The rooms at the resort are surprisingly affordable and can help the tourists to spend some amazing moments with their loved ones.

Rooms at the resort open out to mesmerizing beauty of the hills. Vacationers can enjoy their stay at the Alpine Suite which is believed to be one of the best designed and largest furnished suites at Munnar. You can also opt for other reasonably priced rooms. So to enjoy your holidays in serene and stylish surroundings, choose Swizz County as the resort of choice.

Rose Garden Homestay

  • Location: 10 km from Munnar
  • Price: Budget to mid-range
  • Highlights: Eco-friendly, views of cardamom plantations
  • Amenities & Activities: Fresh produce, trekking, nature walks, farm tours

If you are looking for friendly and homely environment during your holidays, it is most probable that you would find Rose Garden Homestay as the best location. Located at around 10 kilometers from the beautiful town of Munnar, it overlooks a nursery and cardamom plantation. Some of the delights which the Rose Garden Homestay guests can enjoy are seasonal fruits, freshly grown vegetables, fresh honey, farm grown coffee and spring water.

If you have the adventurous streak in you, then you can opt for lengthy treks that surround the property. Rose Garden offers an eco-friendly homestay that can help a person to collect some everlasting memories by clicking photographs in the picture perfect backdrop. Enjoy this once in a lifetime experience and take home some memories that can be cherished for a lifetime.

Glenmore Resorts

  • Location: North of Munnar
  • Price: Budget
  • Highlights: Small, budget-friendly resort, nature surrounding
  • Amenities & Activities: Trekking, Ayurvedic treatments, barbecue, sightseeing

Glenmore Resorts lies to the north of Munnar town and is a famous place amongst all those travelers who wish to enjoy their holidays on a pre-set budget. This is a six room resort that offers all the required facilities to its guests. Vacationers can enjoy themselves amidst nature or can simply enjoy in the beautiful surroundings.

Guests at Glenmore Resorts can enjoy various facilities like round the clock hot water, continental, south Indian or north Indian cuisine, trekking and sightseeing, Ayurvedic treatments and barbecue facilities. There are some things in life that cannot be expressed in words. So enjoy your stay at Glenmore Resorts.

Spice Tree Munnar

  • Location: Southeast of Munnar
  • Price: Luxury
  • Highlights: Luxury spa, wellness retreat, nature views
  • Amenities & Activities: Spa, nature walks, guided tours, yoga

If you want to get pampered during your holidays, look no further as Spice Tree Munnar offers you the best deal. Located southeast to Munnar, this luxury resort is a perfect destination for all those who want to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life. This spa and resort gives the tourists a chance to explore nature at its best.

Spice Tree Munnar offers a healing retreat to its visitors that can help in reducing and transforming any stress present in mind and body. The time spent amidst the natural beauty of the region can encourage relationships, deepen friendship or build new relations. So come and discover the delightful ambiance at Spice Tree Munnar and spend some wonderful moments with your family.

The Wind

  • Location: 25 km from Munnar
  • Price: Mid-range to luxury
  • Highlights: Cliff-edge cottages, panoramic views
  • Amenities & Activities: Sightseeing, traditional Kerala hospitality, relaxing stay

Set amidst a beautiful location, The Wind is situated approximately 25 kilometers away from the famous Munnar town. Elegantly designed cottages of The Wind offer panoramic views of the vicinity and overlook the cliff edge. It provides its guests with world class facilities and the best traditional Kerala hospitality. Every tourist visiting The Wind in Munnar can enjoy the nature at its best.

In addition to a relaxed stay, tourists can also enjoy sightseeing and tour assistance. Tourists can enjoy breathtaking beauty of the God’s own country during their stay at The Wind. So choose a honeymoon cliff cottage or cliff cottage to enjoy an unforgettable holiday.

Camp Noel Nature Resort

  • Location: Near Munnar town
  • Price: Mid-range
  • Highlights: Secluded wild location, nature retreat
  • Amenities & Activities: Trekking, nature walks, bird watching, quiet retreat

Camp Noel Nature Resort is a special retreat for all those who love to spend some time with the nature. Set amidst tranquil location, Camp Noel Nature Resort helps the tourists to enjoy themselves amidst the serene ambiance of Munnar. The secluded wildness of the region can help the vacationers to enjoy the best of the region. It only takes a few minutes to reach the hotel from the main town.

At Camp Noel Nature Resort, nature lovers can choose a room depending upon their requirements and budget. The stunning vista and majestic views of lush green forests can help the tourists to get closer to Mother Nature.

So while in Munnar, choose one of the magical Munnar homestays or hotels and enjoy yourself amidst the captivating beauty of the region. Tourists can also delve in the beauty of the exotic flower, Neelakurinji that blooms once in every 12 years and covers the hill station in blue color. The beauty of Munnar can be believed only after seeing it. Munnar also offers a chance to the adventure lovers to try their hand at different activities. So pack your bags and plan a trip at the earliest to this beautiful and mesmerizing location with your family or friends and capture some everlasting memories in your camera or your mind. Happy journey!
